name: Kontexto
overview:
Launched in February 2008, Kontexto builds software platforms and services that help groups of people to experience the real time web. Developers, businesses and consumers inspire all of our real time web projects as we strive to make the real time web easy and accessible for everyone.

When something makes it past the idea stage at Kontexto, it gets some special treatment. We give it a proper name, launch a standalone website, build developer hooks and offer basic end user interfaces so different people can start experiencing the service as soon as possible.

From there, we continue to grow our portfolio of real time web projects into self sustaining businesses that are of interest to developers, businesses and consumers alike.

funding_rounds.source_description: Sargas Capital Commits to Majority Ownership of Kontexto
